short_summary: Buy CAT1, CAT2, CAT3, CAT5, CAT6 FC
description: Public Works Government Services Canada's (PWGSC) Real Property Branch, on behalf of its client Canada Revenue Agency, has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to the National Capital Region by September, 2024.
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement for Office Furniture
### Overview

 Following the recent amendment to the tender submission deadline, Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing this update to inform potential bidders of the changed conditions for responding to the Request for Bid (RFB).

**Procurement Overview**

 PWGSC's Real Property Branch, on behalf of its client Canada Revenue Agency, invites submissions for the purchase, delivery, and installation of various office furniture items, categorised under categories 1,2,3,5,6 in the National Capital Region, by September 2024.

### Tenders

The tender is issued as part of a selective tendering process using Supply Arrangement methodology.

**Bid Submission Guidelines**

To respond to this RFB, bidders must submit their bid applications and required supporting documentation by June 17, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT. Any bids received after this time will be considered non-responsive and will not be reviewed.

### Request for Bids and Attachments

The full RFB and supporting documentation can be accessed through the SAP Ariba platform. Please note that access to these resources requires a valid SAP Ariba account.

### Important Details

* Tender reference number: WS4578856281
* Solicitation number: WS4578856281
* Tender closing date: June 17, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT
* Expected contract start date: August 2, 2024
* Expected contract end date: None
* Regions of opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contact Information

For any questions or clarification, please contact:

Michelle Wong
partment of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Telephone: [No phone number]
Email: [michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Related Documents

This announcement is available in both English and French at the following link:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19809735?extsite=MTk4MDk3MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Please note that access to the document requires a valid SAP Ariba account. Respondents are advised to log in to their SAP Ariba account to access the document. [no attachment] 

# Notes:
This tender failed and this is an archived tender.
